DocWalker & A base class for all documentation generators. \\
Program & The command line interface. \\
TexTableWalker & A documentation generator that makes separate LaTeX tables for each class
     and a class description table. \\
\bottomrule
\end{longtabu}

DocWalker

\begin{longtabu} to \textwidth { l | X | X | X[2] | X[3] }
\hiderowcolors \multicolumn{5}{l}{Methods} \tabularnewline \midrule \showrowcolors
\textbf{Name} & \textbf{Modifiers} & \textbf{Return Type} & \textbf{Parameters} & \textbf{Description} \\
OnClass & public abstract & void & (ClassDeclarationSyntax klass, DocumentationCommentTriviaSyntax doc) & The callback that gets executed whenever a documentation comment is on a class. \\
OnField & public abstract & void & (FieldDeclarationSyntax field, DocumentationCommentTriviaSyntax doc) & The callback that gets executed whenever a documentation comment is on a field. \\
OnProperty & public abstract & void & (PropertyDeclarationSyntax property, DocumentationCommentTriviaSyntax doc) & The callback that gets executed whenever a documentation comment is on a property. \\
OnMethod & public abstract & void & (MethodDeclarationSyntax method, DocumentationCommentTriviaSyntax doc) & The callback that gets executed whenever a documentation comment is on a method. \\
VisitTrivia & public override & void & (SyntaxTrivia trivia) & The visitor that executes the callbacks. \\
\bottomrule
\end{longtabu}

TexTableWalker

\begin{longtabu} to \textwidth { l | X | X | X[2] | X[3] }
\hiderowcolors \multicolumn{5}{l}{Properties} \tabularnewline \midrule \showrowcolors
\textbf{Name} & \textbf{Modifiers} & \textbf{Type} & \textbf{Accessors} & \textbf{Description} \\
MemberTables & public & Dictionary<string, ClassMembers> & { get; } & The generated member tables in LaTeX syntax. \\
ClassTable & public & string & { get; } & The generated class table in LaTeX syntax. \\
\hiderowcolors \multicolumn{5}{l}{Methods} \tabularnewline \midrule \showrowcolors
\textbf{Name} & \textbf{Modifiers} & \textbf{Return Type} & \textbf{Parameters} & \textbf{Description} \\
OnClass & public override & void & (ClassDeclarationSyntax klass, DocumentationCommentTriviaSyntax doc) & Adds a class description to the class table. \\
OnField & public override & void & (FieldDeclarationSyntax field, DocumentationCommentTriviaSyntax doc) & Adds a field description to the member table of its class. \\
OnProperty & public override & void & (PropertyDeclarationSyntax property, DocumentationCommentTriviaSyntax doc) & Adds a property description to the member table of its class. \\
OnMethod & public override & void & (MethodDeclarationSyntax method, DocumentationCommentTriviaSyntax doc) & Adds a method description to the member table of its class. \\
Esc & private static & string & (string s) & Escapes a string for safe inclusion in a LaTeX table. \\
ClassKey & private static & string & (SyntaxNode syntax) & Finds the class name of a given member. \\
\bottomrule
\end{longtabu}
